title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Consumer confidence bounces back in September. Dems want election to be about COVID-19, not the economy. Kamala Harris confuses Notorious B.I.G. and Notorious R.B.G. Harris says favorite living rapper is deceased Tupac. Dwayne Johnson's endorsement of Biden receives fan backlash, he sold his endorsement to the ChiComs. Biden asks for two breaks in 90 minute debate, refuses drug test. Media sets low bar for Biden, if he survives, he'll be declared the winner. Media said Hillary won every debate. The Crock endorsed Bush at 2000 RNC. Biden refuses to allow to have his ears inspected for transmitters before debate. Defunding the police falls apart in Minneapolis. Reimagine government without Democrats. Sundowning impact on dementia sufferers, did Biden campaign try to reset his sleep clock? Callers on what they think will happen at the debate. Biden will attack Trump with every answer.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Rumors about earpiece inspection at debate. NYT tax story debunks three conspiracy theories, they have nothing. If there was criminality, the IRS would have found it long ago. Biden campaign denies asking for breaks, says he won't wear earpiece. Speculation on Biden's mental ability is fair game, he's running for most powerful office in world. Biden's debate strategy. We're reliving the 2016 campaign -- Democrats, media believe polls, missing enthusiasm for Trump. Will Trump be accused of being mean to Biden? Ryan vs. Biden debate in 2012.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Trump's COVID-19 testing announcement yesterday was huge and being ignored. Story after story about mail-in ballot fraud in Democrat area. O'Keefe busts Ilhan Omar campaign ballot harvesting. Mail-in ballots should not count. Dems can't win honest elections because they're not a majority. Criminal underworld that trades on ballots and forgeries, preys on senior citizens. Trump continues to talk about ballot fraud. Jill and Joe Biden made a deal with the cabal running his campaign. Harry Reid accused Romney of not paying taxes with no evidence. Trump should not back off on Biden if debate really happens.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
